extension.summary: AnimeXplore: Addon para Kodi que conecta con servidores de anime para ver contenido gratis, sin anuncios ni distracciones, en un entorno limpio y fluido.

extension.summary: AnimeXplore: Addon for Kodi that connects to anime servers to watch free content, without ads or distractions, in a clean and fluid environment.
extension.description: Discover AnimeXplore, the definitive addon for anime lovers! AnimeXplore connects your Kodi directly to multiple anime streaming servers to enjoy your favorite series and movies for free, without ads and without distractions.
